message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. I've included a certificate of authenticity and a 30-day warranty. Would you like to purchase it?
I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the first product! This one is also a high-quality item, but I've noticed that it has a slight cosmetic flaw. It's still fully functional and meets all the performance standards, but it might not look as pristine as the first one. Would you like to take a look and consider purchasing it for $10000?
I'm not interested in a product with a cosmetic flaw, even if it's fully functional. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your preference for flawless products. This one is also high-quality, but I'm willing to offer you a premium service package that includes a thorough inspection and cleaning to ensure it looks like new. The price remains at $10000, but I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the condition of this product. Would you like to reconsider?
I'll take a chance on this one, but only if you're willing to throw in the premium service package. If it's not as good as promised, I'll be disappointed.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on this one! However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is a bit of an exception to the norm. It's still a great value, but it may not meet the same standards as the previous products you've seen. I'm willing to offer it to you for $5000, a significant discount from the usual price of $10000. Would you like to take a look and consider purchasing it?
I'm not sure what you mean by'may not meet the same standards', but I'm not willing to take a risk on a product that's potentially not up to par. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your caution with the previous product. This one is a different story, though. It's a high-quality product that I'm confident will meet or exceed your expectations. In fact, I'd like to offer you a 10% discount on this one, bringing the price down to $9000. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's worth considering.
I'm willing to take a chance on this one, especially with the 10% discount. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're pleased with your previous purchase! This next product is also high-quality, and I'd like to offer you a similar discount as before. However, I'll throw in an additional incentive - I'll include a complimentary accessory that complements this product perfectly. The price remains at $9000, but I think you'll find it's a great value. Would you like to take a look?
I'm intrigued by the complimentary accessory and the discount. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're excited about the accessory! This next product is also a high-quality item, and I'd like to offer you an even better deal. I'll give you an additional 5% discount, bringing the price down to $8550. Plus, I'll include a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. Would you like to take a look?
I'm liking the sound of this deal! The additional discount and the money-back guarantee make it a very attractive offer. I'll take it!

I'll let you purchase it for the same price as before, $8550, but I'll also throw in a personalized setup and training session to help you get the most out of this product.
